about_the_game:
Accursed is a first-person psychological horror game. Focusing primarily on creating an atmosphere full of tension and suspense.

Please note: The game focuses on exploration and builds tension slowly to create a deeper and more meaningful experience. Its story is unveiled through surreal imaging and subtle environment details. If you are not a fan of Psychological horror games, I do not recommend this game for you.

Environment



The game is set inside a huge house in which terrible things are going to happen. You’ll wander through the gloomy corridors, explore every room, and solve puzzles to access new areas. Prepare to be confined in a basement and be hunted inside your house.

Gameplay


You will be able to interact with the environment, pick up key elements, solve puzzles, and find things that will help you escape this hell, no weapons can save you from the scarred hunter stalking you from the next corner, the next door, or behind your back.

Story


There are news that people are missing from their homes, later their bodies are found, brutally murdered with limbs missing. As a player you will try to understand what these victims have in common so you can uncover the truth and solve why this stranger is at your home?


The Pursuer


The pursuer's wife died years ago and is willing to do anything to bring her back. He will watch every step you'll make, wait at every corner and will try to make you feel insane. What does he want? What are his true intentions ? You will have to find out by yourself.


Key Features
  • Atmospheric environment and photo-realistic graphics.
  • Interact with objects.
  • Various puzzles to solve
  • 4 Themed Levels

content_descriptors.notes: Accursed includes gore, offensive language, and other frightening scenery which some players may find disturbing.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Accursed is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore a mysterious ever-changing house in a slow-paced, atmospheric world and survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.
